nodes.text: The Geillia system was a star system that was located within the Keldrath sector, a part of the Outer Rim Territories and the Slice regions. The system was the origin point of the Geillian ale beverage.
The Geillia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square T-6.
